EXTRACTED VALUE: There's simply not that much to say. After all, it's freakin' ping pong.
The combination of slow pacing and boring, nondescript environments makes for too many dull stretches. [Feb 2006, p.86]
The single-player game has a few rough spots, but multiplayer is flat-out fantastic. And let’s face it; the incredible graphics don’t hurt either.
It has flashes of brilliance, but overall presents a shallow experience with gameplay unworthy of the 360's potential.
It is as if every great game you ever loved came together in a tantric orgy to birth the second coming of the Lord, it's just that good.
